<h1 align="center">
  Adopt Pet App
</h1>

## 📝 -About

Adopt Pet app is an open source web app, which helps on both sides: people who are looking for someone to adopt their pet and also for persons who are looking for pets to adopt.

A person can publish his pet's info, only if he is a member, but anyone can see pets available for adoption.

## ⬇️ -Stack

- CSS
- Styled Components.
- Gatsby js

## 💹 -Deploy

This app is deployed to Netlify.
Check the live demo : https://adoptpets.netlify.app/
